title: Long live the king: the Wally Lewis story
creator_credit: Garry Gibson, John Barton and Provisible Australia
brief_description: This is a definitive look at the sporting life and times of the man recognised as the world’s greatesst Rugby League player, Wally Lewis. Lewis’s career in the ‘70s, ‘80s and ‘90s was punctuated by brilliance and controversy and it is all captured, moments that will be remembered in Rugby League history, and a frank, revealing insight into the other side of “The Emperor” - the fiercely proud Queenslander in the maroon jersey - the inimitable Kangaroo in the green and gold!
